entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
